params.name: vocab_file
params.description: Path to a one-wordpiece-per-line vocabulary file.

params.name: spm_file
params.description: Path to SentencePiece file (generally has a .spm or .modelextension) that contains the vocabulary.

params.name: do_lower_case
params.description: Whether to lower case the input. Only has an effect when do_basic_tokenize=True.

params.name: word_tokenizer_type
params.description: Type of word tokenizer. Choose from [basic, mecab, sudachi, jumanpp].

params.name: subword_tokenizer_type
params.description: Type of subword tokenizer. Choose from [wordpiece, character, sentencepiece,].

params.name: mecab_kwargs
params.description: Dictionary passed to the MecabTokenizer constructor.

params.name: sudachi_kwargs
params.description: Dictionary passed to the SudachiTokenizer constructor.

params.name: jumanpp_kwargs
params.description: Dictionary passed to the JumanppTokenizer constructor.
